column4: Is it possible to make a bootable restore cd for linux?  I am constantly trying new operating systems and therefore i am constantly reinstalling.  So it would be nice if i could make an image of my drive and put it on a dvd and when i want to go back to it I could just pop it in and reinstall with all of my patches etc...  already installed.
some people use dd and pipe it to gzip to make the image. it depends
what you want it to look like a myspace page?
